description: This file defines the GroupsProvider class, which manages state related to groups in a Flutter application. It handles loading, adding, updating, and deleting group data via a DataSource, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: GroupsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages the groups' state, including loading, adding, updating, and deleting groups.

methods.name: loadGroups
methods.description: Loads all groups from the data source, updates internal list, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: addGroup
methods.description: Adds a new group through the data source, then reloads the groups.

methods.name: updateGroup
methods.description: Updates an existing group through the data source, then reloads the groups.

methods.name: deleteGroup
methods.description: Deletes a group by ID through the data source, then reloads the groups.
